name.description:
Name used to describe the webhook This is explicitly used in monitoring machinery for metrics Note: Names must be DNS1123 labels like `myauthorizername` or
		 subdomains like `myauthorizer.example.domain`
Required, with no default

type.description: Type refers to the type of the authorizer "Webhook" is supported in the generic API server Other API servers may support additional authorizer types like Node, RBAC, ABAC, etc.

webhook.description: Webhook defines the configuration for a Webhook authorizer Must be defined when Type=Webhook Must not be defined when Type!=Webhook
